categories: Category:Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire (comics)

nodes.text: Shadows of the Empire 3 was the third issue in the six-part Shadows of the Empire series of comics, and was released on July 1, 1996 by Dark Horse Comics.

They outnumber him and outgun him. By all rights, Luke Skywalker should be one dead Jedi-in-training, the target of a surprise attack by Jabba's swoop gang. But he's not… and even he isn't certain of the reason!
